citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 AM on
23-Sep-19.
The inspector knocked several times on the front door of the residence. After no response, the inspector honked the
vehicle horn, called the phone number provided and left a message. Also waited on the property for 30 minutes.

narrative:
